websocket::async_teardown

Start tearing down a boost::asio::ssl::stream. 

template<
    class AsyncStream,
    class TeardownHandler>
void
async_teardown(
    role_type role,
    boost::asio::ssl::stream< AsyncStream >& stream,
    TeardownHandler&& handler);
  » more...

    class Socket,
    class TeardownHandler>

    role_type role,
    Socket& socket,
    TeardownHandler&& handler);
